remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式的 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端將與相關聯的群組位址和連接埠，但不會繫結或否則請使用通訊端。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. `groupAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. `localPort`參數必須指定低於 1024 的連接埠。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

summary.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.

An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端繫結至本機連接埠，並聯結多點傳送的群組接收來自任一多點傳送的群組參與者的資料包。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any multicast group participant. 中指定的本機連接埠和多點傳送的群組位址建構函式。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. 中指定的方法`callback`加入多點傳送的群組作業完成時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果執行階段，需要方法也會執行原則檢查，確認 允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果用戶端不允許存取會擲回。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.

exception.span: The has been disposed.

span.span: The has been disposed.

exception.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始從來自任何寄件者加入多點傳送群組接收 UDP 封包的作業。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from any sender. 中指定的本機連接埠和多點傳送的群組位址建構函式。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. 多點傳送的用戶端必須也已經完成聯結多點傳送群組。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果發生通訊端失敗，就會擲回。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始將 UDP 封包傳送至聯結的多點傳送群組的作業。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the joined multicast group. 用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的目的地位址`remoteEndPoint`參數必須已經傳送多點傳送封包給此收件者。The destination address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter must have already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 某些通訊協定會使用此資訊來傳遞流量控制，品質的服務統計資料或復原訊息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果在指定的位址，將只允許傳輸`remoteEndPoint`參數已傳送多點傳送封包到此收件者。The transmission is only allowed if the address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter has already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 如果用戶端不允許存取會擲回。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果在指定的目的地連接埠`remoteEndPoint`參數是小於 1,024會擲回。If the destination port specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果發生通訊端失敗，就會擲回。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會封鎖來自指定的來源位址的收到的多點傳送封包。The method blocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address from being received. 用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. `sourceAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 位址，但`sourceAddress`參數必須符合用戶端加入多點傳送群組位址系列。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 address, but the `sourceAddress` parameter must match the address family of the multicast group that the client joined. 中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果在執行區塊的來源作業，通訊端失敗就會擲回。If there is a socket failure while performing the block source operation, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . Dispose 方法會使中無法使用的狀態。The Dispose method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成非同步作業以將封包傳送至多點傳送群組。The method completes an asynchronous operation to send a packet to a multicast group. 如果在執行接收作業，通訊端失敗就會擲回。If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

exception.span: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

span.span: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
Returns .

value.span: 值，指出是否傳送應用程式傳遞至多點傳送群組的傳出封包。

span.span: A value that indicates if outgoing packets to a multicast group are delivered to the sending application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送的流量是可擴充的方法，在網際網路上的多對多通訊。Multicast traffic is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet. 處理程序訂閱的多點傳送的群組位址。A process subscribes to a multicast group address. 然後，每個訂閱的多點傳送位址的處理序都會收到所訂閱的程序傳送至多點傳送群組的任何封包。Then, any packets sent by a subscribed process to the multicast group are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address. 此用戶端屬性會控制任何在本機電腦上的處理是否接收多點傳送封包傳送至多點傳送群組。The property controls whether any process on the local computer receives multicast packets sent by this client to the multicast group.

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

exception.span: The has been disposed.

span.span: The has been disposed.

summary.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的接收緩衝區的基礎用於多點傳送的接收作業，在此執行個體。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具體而言，屬性會控制封包到達，但尚未呼叫應用程式時，由堆疊所用的緩衝區大小方法。Specifically, the property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果這個緩衝區填滿，而且封包一直出現在應用程式會呼叫之前和方法，舊的封包會遭到捨棄。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 應用程式永遠無法收到舊的封包，並呼叫時，則改為將會收到較新的封包方法。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. 在 Windows 上的接收緩衝區的預設大小為 8192 個位元組。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

summary.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 傳送緩衝區大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的基礎通訊端上的多點傳送的傳送作業所使用的傳送緩衝區執行個體。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying Socket used for multicast send operations on this instance. 呼叫或是方法會比較長，呼叫回呼的值而定屬性，如果傳送緩衝區已滿。calls to the or methods will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 屬性唯一的控制項，使用者的緩衝區是否保持您的實體記憶體中鎖定，直到傳送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. 在 Windows 上的傳送緩衝區的預設大小為 8192 個位元組。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: The address of the source to unblock.

span.span: The address of the source to unblock.

summary.span: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.

span.span: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會解除封鎖來自指定的來源位址，因此可接收多點傳送封包。The method unblocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address so they can be received. 指定的來源位址必須先前已封鎖的呼叫方法。The specified source address must have previously been blocked by a call to the method. 用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. `sourceAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 如果指定的來源位址`sourceAddress`參數不先前被封鎖的呼叫所方法，會擲回。If the specified source address in the `sourceAddress` parameter was not previously blocked by a call to the method, a is thrown with . 如果在執行解除封鎖來源作業，通訊端失敗就會擲回。If there is a socket failure while performing the unblock source operation, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
